scripts.setup: npm install -g http-server; mkdir dist src lib
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && browserify src/index.js --standalone ThreeFisheye -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types ] ] -t espowerify
scripts.start: http-server -s &   watchify src/index.js --standalone ThreeFisheye -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types ] ] -t espowerify -v
